info.title: TDEI Management API
info.description: Management API, describes admin & user activities in the TDEI system.

post.summary: Authenticates the user to the TDEI system
post.description: Authenticates the user to the TDEI system.  Returns access token.

200.description: Successful response - Returns the access token object.
Successful response - Returns the access token object.
Successful response - Returns the list of roles.

get.summary: Gets the user associated project groups with roles.
get.description: Gets the user associated project groups with roles.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User id for which project groups to be fetched

200.description: Successful response - Returns the user project groups with roles.

post.summary: Registers the user to the TDEI system
post.description: Registers the user to the TDEI system.  Returns new User object.

200.description: Successful response - Returns the newly created object.

get.summary: Gets the Services in the TDEI system
get.description: Gets the Services in the TDEI system .

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: A bounding box which specifies the area to be searched. A bounding box is specified by a string providing the lat/lon coordinates of the corners of the bounding box. Coordinate should be specified as west, south, east, north.

401.description: Unauthenticated request. Check your access token or API-Key.

404.description: tdei_project_group_id or tdei_service_id doesn't exist in the system.

post.summary: Creates a Service in the TDEI system
post.description: Creates a Service in the TDEI system.Returns the id for the newly created flex service.

200.description: Successful response - Returns the id for the newly created flex service.

put.summary: Updates a Service in the TDEI system
put.description: Updates a Service in the TDEI system.

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: Service Id of the service to be Activated/Deactivated.

post.summary: Associates a user with the project group and permissions in the TDEI system
post.description: Associates a user with the project group and permissions in the TDEI system. Returns the boolean flag true.

200.description: Successful response - Returns the boolean flag true.
Successful response - Returns the boolean flag true.

get.summary: Gets the project groups in the TDEI system
get.description: Gets the project groups in the TDEI system.

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: A bounding box which specifies the area to be searched. A bounding box is specified by a string providing the lat/lon coordinates of the corners of the bounding box. Coordinate should be specified as west, south, east, north.

200.description: Returns the list of project groups.

401.description: Unauthenticated request. Check your access token or API-key.

404.description: tdei_project_group_id doesn't exist in the system.

post.summary: Creates an project group in the TDEI system
post.description: Creates an project group in the TDEI system.  Returns the id for the newly created project group.

200.description: Successful response - Returns the id for the newly created project group.

put.summary: Updates an project group in the TDEI system
put.description: Updates an project group in the TDEI system.  Returns success if updated.

get.summary: Gets the project group users in the TDEI system
get.description: Gets the project group users in the TDEI system.

parameters.name: projectGroupId
parameters.description: Project group id for which users to be fetched

200.description: Returns the list of project group users.

parameters.name: projectGroupId
parameters.description: projectGroupId of the project group to be Activated/Deactivated.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Boolean flag to Activate/Deactivate project group.

post.description: Resets the user credential.  Returns the boolean flag if the password is reset successfully.

200.description: Successful response - Returns the boolean flag if the password is reset successfully.

403.description: Not authorized to reset the password

roles.description: List of roles associated with project group.

ProjectGroupRoles.description: User associated project groups and roles.

id.description: User Id name of the user.

email.description: Email address of the user for communication.

phone.description: Phone of the user for communication.

email.description: Email address of the user for communication.

phone.description: Phone of the user for communication.

tdei_service_id.description: Service Id uniquely represented in the TDEI system. System generated.

tdei_project_group_id.description: Project group id of the service.

tdei_service_id.description: Service Id uniquely represented in the TDEI system. System generated.

tdei_project_group_id.description: Project group id to which point of contact to be associated.

poc_user_name.description: Point of contact username. Username represents user uniquely in the TDEI system. User should be already registered in the TDEI system using [POST] /user API.

PointOfContact.description: Describes a point of contact details.

tdei_project_group_id.description: Project group id to which user to be associated.

user_name.description: Username represents user uniquely in the TDEI system.  User should be already registered in the TDEI system using [POST] /user API.

roles.description: List of roles to be assigned to the user.

items.description: List of roles to be assigned to the user.

id.description: Id uniquely represented in the TDEI system. System generated.

tdei_project_group_id.description: Project group Id uniquely represented in the TDEI system. System generated.

phone.description: Phone of the project group for communication.

url.description: Url of the transit project group.

address.description: Address of the transit project group.

tdei_project_group_id.description: ProjectGroupId uniquely represented in the TDEI system. System generated.

phone.description: Phone of the project group for communication.

url.description: Url of the transit project group.

address.description: Address of the transit project group.
